channel.title: Help with a few codes?
channel.description:
Okay so im having errors. i downloaded a blank client and source, im constantly fixing problems it has but im not that great. When adding npc's ( Bankers ) to my bank. i get them added but their's 2 things im confused about.
A necklace\glitch hangs from the banker im using its at his feet how can i fix this ?
Their facing the wall i need them facing the bank how do i change the direction their facing ?
How do i add and remove objects ? the blank source im using whoever edited it added a bunch of random crates to varrack center and fish equipment i would like to remove all of them in the server and add them in manually may take a very long time but i want 2
